metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20726 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in host.php (viatree.php) in Cacti before 1.2.0 due to lack of escaping of unintendedcharacters in the Website Hostname field for Devices.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20726` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1').
